/*input
4
2
4
10
55
*/

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define PII pair<ll, ll>
#define f first
#define s second
#define F(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i <= (ll)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i >= (ll)(b); i--)

ll t, n,c,cb,ans;
ll arr[50];
int main() 
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
		c=0,cb=0;
		while(n>0)
		{
			arr[c++]=n%2;
			if(n%2)
				cb++;
			n/=2;
		}
		ll mp=c-1;
		ll cnt[c];
		cnt[0]=arr[0];
		F(i,1,c-1)
			cnt[i]=arr[i]+cnt[i-1];
		if(cb==1)
		{
			cout<<mp-1<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		ans=1000000000;
		RF(i,c-2,0)
		{
			if(arr[i]==1)
				ans=min(ans,max(mp-1+cb-cnt[i],cnt[i]+i-1));
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
